---
Song: manathil uruthi
Film: Manadhil urudhi vaendum
---
Notes: s r1 g3 m1 p d1 n2 S

manathil uruthi vaendum 
s s r    ss n.  s   s

vaarthaiyile thelivum vaendum  
s   r   m m  m  m m   pmg g

unarchi enbathu vaendum  
gm  p   gmp p   ndp  p

oLi padaitha paarvai vaendum  
pd  n d  p   m   m   g   m

gnaana theebam yetra vaendum  
dp  m  g   m   pg r  s   rsn.

(manathil..) 

Stanza 1:

idaivarum palavidha thadaigalai thagarthingu vaazhnthu kaatta vaendum
sm  m m   m m m m   s  m  m m   m  m  m   m  gmd   p   gmd p  m   pmg

ilakkiya penmaikku ilakkanam neeyena yaarum poatra vaendum
sr  m g  rs s   s  sr  m g   rs s s  srmg   srm g  rs  s

maathar thammai kaeli paesum moodar vaayai mooduvoam 
pnpS    S   S   nSRS  dp p   pnpS   S  S   nSRS dp
  
maanam kaakkum maanthar yaarkum maalai vaangi poaduvom 
srsd   d   d   pdS n    dp  p   s  d   d   d  pdSn dp

veedu kaakkum pennai vaazhthi naadum yaedum paesa vaendum  
mpmn  n   n   nd d   d    d   pdnp   mpdp   gmpg  s   rsn.

(manathil..) 

samaikkindra karangalum sarithiram padappathai boomi paarkka vaendum  
thoorathu thesathil baratha penmaiyin paadal kaetka vaendum  
pengal koottam peigal endru paadal sonna sithargalum 
eendra thaayum penmai endru eNNidaatha pithargale 
yaesinaalum paesinaalum anjidaamal vaazha vaendum  

(manathil..)
